series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Todd the Metal God
synopsis: Todd uses The Book to transform himself into a Heavy Metal guitar god.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: How to Make a Homunculus
synopsis: Hannah is desperate to win the science fair so she uses The Book to make a small magical creature.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Rock N’ Roll Zombies Know Best
synopsis: Todd's attempt to make Jenny jealous back-fires.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Gay Day
synopsis: Crowley High's only gay student uses The Book to make every boy gay like him.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Monster Fat
synopsis: Todd, who has a fear of fat people, must fight an evil monster made from human fat.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Invasion of the Stupid Snatchers
synopsis: When the school is overcome with an evil smoke that turns the students stupid, Hannah must step up and save the entire student body.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Terrible Twin Turf Tussle
synopsis: Todd is torn between jealousy and arousal when Jenny takes up lesbianism.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Cockfight
synopsis: Todd and Curtis’ prank on a small-endowed bully backfires.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Big Bad Baby
synopsis: Todd sets out to prove to Jenny that he’s father material by delivering a gigantic baby borne from the power of The Book.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: The Ghost of Chet Sukowski
synopsis: Todd is challenged to a deadly drag race by a basketball star possessed by a ghost from the 1950’s.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: The Phantom of Crowley High
synopsis: Todd and Jenny star the most fantastic musical Crowley High has ever seen,  whileCurtis falls in love with the evil Phantom.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Checkmate
synopsis: Todd is prophesized to be the Pure Evil one.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: A Farewell to Curtis’ Arm
synopsis: Curtis uses The Book to get a new arm, while Todd learns some disturbing news about his past and future.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Redierment Home
synopsis: Todd, Curtis and Hannah break into the retirement home to rescue Jenny from the clutches of the evil Satanic Society.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: The Student Body
synopsis: Todd breaks up with the Gang to avoid hurting them, but he’s forced to intervene when they’re sucked into a dangerous new social group.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Daddy Tissues
synopsis: As skinned bodies begin to pile up in the school’s bathrooms, Jenny realizes her Dad isn’t the hero she thought he was.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Simply The Beast
synopsis: When cheerleaders start disappearing, Todd, Jenny, and Atticus each attempt to solve the mystery.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Jungle Fever
synopsis: Hannah must establish dominance over a dimwitted Neanderthal Gang.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Fisting Fantasy
synopsis: Trapped inside a video game, the Gang embark on an epic quest to slay The Red Knight .

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: See You Later, Masturbator
synopsis: Jimmy is fired for peeping on students and Todd vows to clear his name.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Loser Generated Content
synopsis: The A/V Club use the Book to turn the Gang’s lives into a psycho thriller.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Deathday Cake
synopsis: Jenny plays peacemaker as Todd and Hannah compete to throw Curtis the ultimate birthday bash.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: 2 Girls, 1 Tongue
synopsis: It’s up to Hannah to save the day when Curtis’ ex-girlfriend, the Phantom of Crowley High, returns.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: B.Y.O.B.O.P.E.
synopsis: Todd and Curtis vow to lose their virginities during a house party, but two uninvited guests make things complicated.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: The Toddyssey
synopsis: Todd uses a time-traveling paraplegic student as a taxi to the future.

series_name: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil
title: Black Tie Showdown
synopsis: Danger builds to ultimate showdown between Todd and Atticus at the Crowley High Semi-Formal.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Tourist Trap
synopsis: Five friends are hunted by a creepy killer after stopping to visit a roadside museum.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Sleepaway Camp
synopsis: A deranged killer stalks kids and counselors at summer camp in this 80s cult classic.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Rabid
synopsis: In David Cronenberg’s early cult favorite, a woman develops a thirst for blood after experimental plastic surgery.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: The Prowler
synopsis: A killer returns to a sleepy town thirty years after his haunting massacre.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Sorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-Rama
synopsis: 3 horny nerds, 2 sorority sisters, and 1 badass chick unleash a mischievous imp.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Daughters of Darkness
synopsis: A pair of newlyweds become the targets of a bloodthirsty vampire countess and her female lover.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Blood Feast
synopsis: Herschell Gordon Lewis' shocking cult classic is considered the first gore movie.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Basket Case
synopsis: A man begins killing off the people who separated him from his deformed siamese twin.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Re-Animator
synopsis: This beloved ‘80s cult horror hit follows a student who brings the dead back to life.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Demons
synopsis: A horror movie audience turns into bloodthirsty demons.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Legend of Boggy Creek
synopsis: This cult 1970s horror docudrama drama questions the existence of the Fouke Monster, a Sasquatch-type creature that lives in a swamp outside of Fouke, Arkansas.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Hellraiser
synopsis: A puzzle box reveals a realm of sadistic monsters led by a being named Pinhead.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: Pieces
synopsis: A chainsaw killer starts mutilating college kids in this 80's slasher favorite.

series_name: The Last Drive-in With Joe Bob Briggs
title: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs: TESTIMONIALS
synopsis: The Last Drive in With Joe Bob Briggs

title: Trepalium Ep. 1
synopsis: Somewhere in the future, decades of crisis have created a society where only 20% of the population is employed.

title: Trepalium Ep. 2
synopsis: Ruben’s wife Thaïs is missing.

title: Trepalium Ep. 3
synopsis: Izia finds herself caught in a vicious circle.

title: Trepalium Ep. 4
synopsis: A colleague of Izia at Aquaville has found out she’s a Zoner.

title: Trepalium Ep. 5
synopsis: Ruben finds out Izia has been working for the Activists.

title: Trepalium Ep. 6
synopsis: Revelations of an ugly secret concerning the City’s water supply and a conspiracy between the government and Aquaville sets off a powder keg of outrage.

title: Supermax Ep. 1
synopsis: The game begins in the Supermax prison. With edgy competitors and mysterious airs, tensions already escalate high.

title: Supermax Ep. 2
synopsis: The team loses contact with the show’s producers. The disappearance of one of the competitors, leads to mysterious findings in the prison’s underground tunnels.

title: Supermax Ep. 3
synopsis: Dante returns with ominous warnings to the group. The team struggles to survive and find a way out of the prison.

title: Supermax Ep. 4
synopsis: Tensions swell with the growing certainty that the team has been abandoned. Cecília makes a mysterious recovery, but Sabrina is wounded in a hunting trap.

title: Supermax Ep. 5
synopsis: When Cecília grows worse and becomes a risk to the team, the competitors agree the only way to survive is to kill her.

title: Supermax Ep. 6
synopsis: Artur finds the control room. Bruna goes missing. Sérgio makes an eerie discovery: the show has been cancelled.

title: Supermax Ep. 7
synopsis: The participants discover the mysterious B Area. Bruna is made prisoner and raped by a strange cult.

title: Supermax Ep. 8
synopsis: A flashback episode narrates the origins of Supermax.

title: Supermax Ep. 9
synopsis: When Sérgio manages to rescue Bruna, Dante returns with a suspicious attitude. The team devises an escape plan that goes awry when Baal intercepts them.

title: Supermax Ep. 10
synopsis: It’s their last chance to escape. The team faces mass murder and no mercy in their final battle against Baal, fighting for survival.

title: Halloween Special
synopsis: Even if you’ve never seen the films: you know the mask, and you know what those haunting piano notes portend. Why? Who better to explain than heir-apparent Halloween child star Danielle Harris.

title: Steve Ellison AKA Flying Lotus
synopsis: How’d Steven Ellison follow up his diverse, Grammy-nominated music career? By prompting walkouts with his controversial debut film Kuso. Plus, SFX expert Jim Ojala shows us how to look pretty in puke.

title: Simon Barrett
synopsis: Simon Barrett (writer of You’re Next, The Guest, Blair Witch) talks tension and what's so great about a blender... as an instrument of death.

title: The Soska Sisters
synopsis: The Soska Sisters show how they achieve their films’ practical body horrors without CG.

title: Mary Harron
synopsis: Wanna hear from an American master? Good. We’ve got iconic director Mary Harron to talk holding audiences in the palm of her hand.

title: Leigh Whannell
synopsis: What makes a film terrifying enough to make us jump? Leigh Whannell (Saw, Insidious)  explains it all. We then examine immersive haunted houses, guided by one of the field’s most unique creators.

title: Rodney Ascher
synopsis: The Nightmare’s Rodney Ascher shows us how he turns his vivid childhood traumas into adulthood art. Then, a sleep specialist gets into the science of sleep paralysis, hallucinatory demons and all.

title: Spectrevision
synopsis: Elijah Wood’s acclaimed company SpectreVision rips into the heart at the core of even the most provocative genre films. Plus, a doctor has her patients strap on VR glasses to confront their fears.

title: Hooper / Romero Tribute
synopsis: THE CORE pays tribute to George A. Romero and Tobe Hooper with Ken Foree (Dawn Of The Dead), Daniel Pearl (DP, The Texas Chainsaw Massacre), and Gabriel Bartalos (FX, The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2).

title: Danzig
synopsis: Punk and Metal icon Glenn Danzig discusses the genre films that have influenced his work, including his favorite on-screen bloodbaths.

series_name: AMC Visionaries: Robert Kirkman's Secret History of Comics
title: The Mighty Misfits Who Made Marvel
synopsis: How two men changed comics forever.

series_name: AMC Visionaries: Robert Kirkman's Secret History of Comics
title: The Truth About Wonder Woman
synopsis: Story behind the first female superhero.

series_name: AMC Visionaries: Robert Kirkman's Secret History of Comics
title: The Trials of Superman
synopsis: Superman's creators fight for justice.

series_name: AMC Visionaries: Robert Kirkman's Secret History of Comics
title: City of Heroes
synopsis: How 9/11 changed comic books.

series_name: AMC Visionaries: Robert Kirkman's Secret History of Comics
title: The Color of Comics
synopsis: The first African-American comic company

series_name: AMC Visionaries: Robert Kirkman's Secret History of Comics
title: Image Comics: Declaration of Independents
synopsis: The origin story of Image Comics.

title: Born to Kill Ep 1
synopsis: The arrival of new girl Chrissy triggers some alarming behavior in apparently well-balanced schoolboy Sam.

title: Born to Kill Ep 2
synopsis: With the death at the hospital causing suspicion, Sam must tread carefully. Jenny summons the courage to face a threat from the past.

title: Born to Kill Ep 3
synopsis: When Sam exposes Jenny's dark secret her world begins to unravel. Sam comes face to face with his father and Jenny finally begins to understand her son's true nature.

title: Born to Kill Ep 4
synopsis: With Sam's father released from prison, Jenny makes a desperate effort to get to the bottom of Sam's increasingly dangerous behavior. But is she too late?

title: The Ballad of Claire DuBois Part 1
synopsis: Meet Jenny Walker, a New York City private investigator whose latest case has strange written all over it.

title: The Ballad of Claire DuBois Part 2
synopsis: Jenny makes a new enemy, and a friend.
Minisode

title: Team Building Exercises
synopsis: Jenny, Max, and Claire get to know each other. Meanwhile, Ronnie enlists the help of Angela.
Minisode

title: Cloak Meets Dagger
synopsis: Glenn faces Kate after his defeat. Resnick makes an offer.
Minisode

title: The Thin, Cold, Dark
synopsis: The thin, cold, dark.
Minisode

title: Judas
synopsis: Kate takes matters into her own hands.

title: Buyer's Remorse
synopsis: Kate meets Claire, but is unable to act. Resnick has a new mission for Glenn.
Minisode

title: Hunter, Hunting, Hunted
synopsis: Graham and Wilson get another visitor. Glenn gets a lead. Kate admits she’s in over her head.
Minisode

title: Paper Tigers
synopsis: Jenny makes a daring escape. The team closes in. Glenn springs his trap.

title: Season Finale
synopsis: Season One comes to an end, as Jenny, Angela, Ronnie, and Claire finally face off against Glenn, Kate, and Resnick.

title: Jordskott Ep. 1
synopsis: Criminal inspector Eva Thornblad returns to her home town of Silverhojd for the first time in seven years, since her daughter disappeared there without trace.

title: Jordskott Ep. 2
synopsis: The girl that Eva almost drove over turns out to be suffering from some mysterious illness. Can she be Eva's daughter, Josefine, who disappeared seven years ago?

title: Jordskott Ep. 3
synopsis: The girl who Eva is convinced is her daughter has disappeared from the hospital, and with the lack of leads Eva hooks up with the local police force in the hunt for the man thought to be behind both kidnappings and murders in Silverhojd.

title: Jordskott Ep. 4
synopsis: Someone has gotten into the Thornblad farm and has left something there for Eva. Who the hell has been there? And how did they manage to get into the house when doors and windows were locked?

title: Jordskott Ep. 5
synopsis: Josefine's condition is just getting worse by the moment and Eva is faced their life's hardest choice, she must choose between her daughter and another girl.

title: Jordskott Ep. 6
synopsis: Eva makes a fateful decision to save Josefine, but things don't go as she planned and nature's grasp of Eva becomes even harder instead.

title: Jordskott Ep. 7
synopsis: Eva has been mortally wounded by an unknown gunman after uncovering the maple Room at the Thornblad farm.

title: Jordskott Ep. 8
synopsis: Josefine has been kidnapped by Nicklas, whose hid her in the barn. Eva struggles to master the parasite she's swallowed.

title: Jordskott Ep. 9
synopsis: Eva understands more about what happened to her father.

title: Jordskott Ep. 10
synopsis: Eva has been forced to leave Silverhojd to save Josefine, but she returns in order to be able to rescue the missing children at all costs.

title: Jordskott S2 Ep. 1
synopsis: Two years have passed since Silverhöjd was rocked by harrowing events. Eva Thörnblad has left Silverhöjd to return to the grey concrete of the big city and her job with the Stockholm police.

title: Jordskott S2 Ep. 2
synopsis: Eva’s investigation is increasingly wrapped in mystery, and doctors can’t explain why the man under the ice died the way he did.

title: Jordskott S2 Ep. 3
synopsis: The search continues for Robin, the missing girl, and Eva’s situation is complicated by her unexpected responsibility for the runaway, Kalem.

title: Jordskott S2 Ep. 4
synopsis: Eva and Wass visit an old place and find shocking evidence that more children’s lives are in danger.

title: Jordskott S2 Ep. 5
synopsis: Eva is back at the Thörnblad farm, but it isn’t how she had imagined.

title: Jordskott S2 Ep. 6
synopsis: Bahar continues to search for evidence that Eva is involved in Desiree’s death and makes a striking discovery.

title: Jordskott S2 Ep. 7
synopsis: Eva and Wass have to keep working together, despite the fact that their relationship will never be the same again

title: Jordskott S2 Ep. 8
synopsis: Tom and Wass work together, under great pressure, to find Ida’s kidnapper

title: Jordskott S1 Recap
synopsis: Recap of season 1

title: Black Lake Ep. 1
synopsis: Friends travel to an abandoned ski lodge.

title: Black Lake Ep. 2
synopsis: Hanne explores the ski lodge’s horrific past.

title: Black Lake Ep. 3
synopsis: The gang agree to conduct a séance.

title: Black Lake Ep. 4
synopsis: Hanne finds a secret room.

title: Black Lake Ep. 5
synopsis: Oswald is missing.

title: Black Lake Ep. 6
synopsis: Hanne discovers the lodge’s dark history.

title: Black Lake Ep. 7
synopsis: Suspicions grow stronger after the fire.

title: Black Lake Ep. 8
synopsis: Will Hanne break the curse?

title: The Sacrifice
synopsis: Taking refuge in an isolated snow-covered fort, four criminals find secrets, dangers and three alluring sirens.

title: Spooked
synopsis: Harry Seigal is a private investigator who, several years earlier, was dismissed from the police force after accidentally killing a suspect

title: Family Man
synopsis: Dennis Mahoney is an All-American dad: successful, loving, and all-around good guy. All that changes after a car accident leaves him hanging between life and death.

title: In Sickness and in Health
synopsis: A person's wedding should be the happiest event in their life. Not so for one bride who receives a note shortly before the wedding saying the person she is marrying is a serial killer.

title: Eater
synopsis: Officer Bannerman is assigned to watch after the police station with two other officers during the night. Things go routinely until a person is brought into holding

title: New Year's Day
synopsis: Helen wakes up early New Years morning to discover a major disaster has happened.

title: Community
synopsis: A young couple move into a secure gated community and discover its horrifying secret.

title: Skin And Bones
synopsis: Rancher Grady Edlund returns home to his family after being lost in the forest for a number of days.

title: Something with Bite
synopsis: Wilbur is a veterinarian who begins to turn into a werewolf

title: Chance
synopsis: Chance Miller is a down-on-his-luck guy whose luck goes even worse when he finds himself dealing with his evil doppelganger.

title: The Spirit Box
synopsis: Emily D'Angelo is a dead schoolgirl who speaks to her classmates from beyond the grave.

title: Echoes
synopsis: A friendly man discovers that he was a sadistic murderer in a previous life.

title: The Circle
synopsis: A writer heads to a small town to try and recharge his creative juices.

title: The Man from the South
synopsis: The flamboyant stranger goads a young sailor into taking a frightening bet while on holiday in Jamaica.

title: Mrs
synopsis: Mrs Bixby has been having an affair with a wealthy retired hunting colonel.

title: William and Mary
synopsis: The bossed and bullied wife of a brilliant academic continues to be dominated by her husband even after his death

title: Lamb to the Slaughter
synopsis: A distraught pregnant wife arrives home to find her policeman husband strangely murdered.

title: The Landlady
synopsis: Arriving in Bath to take up his first job away from home young Billy Weaver decides to take a room with a charmingly maternal if eccentric landlady.

title: Neck
synopsis: Invited to a weekend house party by Sir Basil Turton and his younger wife, a man is struck by the lady's infidelity.

title: Edward the Conqueror
synopsis: Louisa takes in a strange cat against the wishes of her husband Edward.

title: A Dip in the Pool
synopsis: An American gambler on a trans-Atlantic liner goes into the pool that bets on how far ship sails each day.

title: The Way Up to Heaven
synopsis: Mrs Foster is a worried wife who has a neurotic fear of not being punctual.

title: Billabong
synopsis: When American Eve Thorogood and her family take a vacation in the Australian Outback, they get more than they bargained for.

title: Kutyukutyu
synopsis: Haunted by the violent deaths of her parents and brother, Eve sets out alone on her quest for revenge.

title: Salt Lake
synopsis: Realizing Eve is hunting him, Mick Taylor puts into play a murderous game of cat and mouse.

title: Opalville
synopsis: Mick Taylor returns to wreak havoc in Wolf Creek.

title: Rome
synopsis: The 'skimpy' bar in the pit-stop town of Rome has a new lingerie waitress.

title: Wolf Creek
synopsis: Lured to Wolf Creek Crater, Eve comes face to face with her quarry.

series_name: Inside The Exorcist: A Podcast Experience
title: The Haunted Boy
synopsis: The story of THE EXORCIST is rooted in horrifying facts.

series_name: Inside The Exorcist: A Podcast Experience
title: The Snares of the Devil
synopsis: Priests try - and fail - to exorcise the haunted boy’s demons.

series_name: Inside The Exorcist: A Podcast Experience
title: Jesus Weeps Blood
synopsis: The haunted boy is freed from the demon...or is he?

series_name: Inside The Exorcist: A Podcast Experience
title: Tomb of the Demon
synopsis: The impossible task of casting The Exorcist.

series_name: Inside The Exorcist: A Podcast Experience
title: The Power of Christ Compels You
synopsis: Friedkin wants to shoot the opening sequence of The Exorcist in Iraq, but first he has to teach the Iraqis how to make fake blood.

series_name: Inside The Exorcist: A Podcast Experience
title: The Rapture
synopsis: Audiences break down the doors to see the movie. Hysteria ensues: Vomiting, fainting, heart attacks, and more

series_name: Inside The Exorcist: A Podcast Experience
title: Redemption
synopsis: Too much success too young - William Friedkin is warned by legendary auteur Orson Welles. Friedkin’s production company passes on a little movie called Star Wars so he can make his passion project which is eclipsed by its shadow.

title: Witching Time
synopsis: A 17th-century witch uses her craft to transport herself to the 20th century.

title: The 13th Reunion
synopsis: A reporter investigating a health farm stumbles upon a horrifying truth behind a secret society.

title: Rude Awakening
synopsis: A lecherous estate agent has recurrent dreams about his seductive secretary, a mysterious house and an even more mysterious encouragement to murder his wife.

title: Growing Pains
synopsis: After the death of their young son, a scientist and his wife adopt a new son, but it coincides with a series of odd events and disasters for the father's research.

title: Charlie Boy
synopsis: An ancient African idol, possessed by the spirit of an evil sorcerer, seems to take on a life of its own.

title: The House That Bled to Death
synopsis: After buying it for a good price, a couple and their young daughter move into a house that was the scene of a macabre murder.

title: The Carathian Eagle
synopsis: A young woman, convinced she possesses the reincarnated spirit of a murderess, walks the night seeking out new victims to fill an ancient prophecy for death

title: Guardian of the Abyss
synopsis: Human sacrifice as part of an ancient rite is the unexpected consequence when an attractive antiques dealer unwittingly buys a mirror with mysterious evil powers.

title: The Silent Scream
synopsis: An elderly pet shop owner, who is secretly a former Nazi concentration camp guard, is intent on continuing experiments on human victims.

title: Children of the Full Moon
synopsis: A husband and wife head off on holiday to the West Country, but get stranded.

title: The Mark of Satan
synopsis: A worker in a hospital mortuary becomes convinced that a conspiracy of evil has chosen him as the Devil's disciple.

title: The Two Faces of Evil
synopsis: Setting off on their holidays, a family give a lift to a sinister hitch-hiker.

title: Visitor from the Grave
synopsis: A psychologically fragile woman accidentally kills an intruder who is about to hurt her

title: Chapter 1
synopsis: We are introduced to Billings family and their esteemed dinner guests. That is until, the power went out.

title: Chapter 2
synopsis: Everyone starts to pick up the pieces and we are introduced to James Eggly (a former silent film star) as well as Barbara DuPont (Veronica's socialite nemesis.)

title: Chapter 3
synopsis: We find out what happened when the lights turned back on and the house is faced with a food emergency.

title: Chapter 4
synopsis: News of the party's latest casualty spreads and the fortune teller takes center stage.

title: Chapter 5
synopsis: The party deals with corpse tampering and there is something fishy about the beef wellington.

title: Chapter 6
synopsis: The party learns the origins of Nancy's marriage to Roger and the wine starts flowing.

title: Chapter 7
synopsis: Olivia starts interrogating several of the evening's suspects and a dark secret is unearthed.

title: Chapter 8
synopsis: In the eighth chapter of Deadly Manners, one of the party's biggest secrets becomes jeopardized.

title: Chapter 9
synopsis: The police are finally called to the house.

title: Chapter 10
synopsis: In the final chapter of Season One of Deadly Manners, the killer is confronted and the night's festivities come to a close.

title: Ulysses
synopsis: The first men are landing on Mars.

title: Mars
synopsis: The crew searches for spare parts.

title: Survivor
synopsis: The survivor disapears

title: Stone
synopsis: A US spaceship brings back hope

title: Alliance
synopsis: Jeanne starts having flashbacks

title: Irene
synopsis: Jeanne goes to Thaumasia plain.

title: Fault
synopsis: 1960, Vladimir is on a doomed mission

title: Phoenix
synopsis: Discovery of artefacts

title: Volodia
synopsis: Vladimir reveals his true mission

title: Storm
synopsis: Jeanne has the key to all

title: Sardines
synopsis: At an engagement party, a bedroom with old baggage in it has been left unlocked...

title: A Quiet Night In
synopsis: In this silent farce, burglars attempt to steal a priceless painting from a luxury home.

title: Tom and Gerri
synopsis: When a school teacher repays a good turn, he becomes a victim of his own generosity.

title: Last Gasp
synopsis: A charity brings legendary singer Frankie J Parsons to cheer up sick little girl, Tamsin.

title: The Understudy
synopsis: If a popular West End actor was suddenly indisposed, only his understudy would benefit...

title: The Harrowing
synopsis: Can Hector and Tabitha get Katy to baby-sit their disabled elder brother?

title: Foreign Parts
synopsis: Simon is a man of routine. Rising, dressing, travelling to work on the DLR. Every day is the same. His sense of self is slipping away as he becomes (perhaps literally) someone else.

title: Feeders and Eaters
synopsis: We’re caught in the nocturnal world of the all-night cafe where a waitress is told a love story – a strange, Gothic, warped and weird love story.

title: Closing Time
synopsis: A late-night barfly is engaging in the tradition of weaving club stories for his fellow drinkers

title: Looking for the Girl
synopsis: An ageing photographer tells a reporter the story of his muse once the cameras are off.

title: The Valley Ep. 1
synopsis: A man with amnesia awakens in a vineyard beneath a dead woman. But when she turns up alive a few hours later, the man is drawn into a terrifying mystery.

title: The Valley Ep. 2
synopsis: Sophia, the wine queen, has been murdered. The man who saw her in the vineyard before her death begins his own investigations and discovers contradictions, suspicious behavior, and secret entaglements in the village.

title: The Valley Ep. 3
synopsis: During the course of his investigations the man with no memory comes across an accident that happened a long time ago: Marie, little Adrian’s sister, drowned. What has this to do with Sophia, the murdered wine queen?

title: The Valley Ep. 4
synopsis: Adrian, the young mute, comes under suspicion of murder and the village turns against him.

title: The Valley Ep. 5
synopsis: Everything points to Adrian having brutally killed Sophia the wine queen, but interrogation of the mute boy leads nowhere; instead he is taken to a closed psychiatric ward.

title: The Valley Ep. 6
synopsis: After waking up in the psychiatric ward from his catatonic rigidity, Adrian knows who the murderer is.

title: The Fades Ep. 1
synopsis: Paul struggles with home and school life as apocalyptic visions haunt his dreams and a supernatural creature stalks his home town

title: The Fades Ep. 2
synopsis: As the date of the school ball draws near, so the threat of the Fades escalates dramatically, forcing Paul to make a choice between being an Angelic and leading a normal life.

title: The Fades Ep. 3
synopsis: As Paul’s powers manifest themselves, his friendship with Mac and relationship with Jay are pushed to breaking point.

title: The Fades Ep. 4
synopsis: Up is down and black is white as Paul’s family and friends struggle to cope in the aftermath of his accident.

title: The Fades Ep. 5
synopsis: Paul came back to life for a reason, but he’s just not sure what that reason might be.

title: The Fades Ep. 6
synopsis: A town left deserted. An Angelic on the edge of desperation. A Fade on the cusp of victory. And a reluctant 17 year old boy with visions of the apocalypse – it all comes down to this final showdown.

title: Lesbian Vampire Lovers of Lust
synopsis: Steve Coogan narrates a gruesome tale that sees Captain Hans Broken and his beautiful bride trapped in a remote castle at the mercy of luscious undead ladies.

title: Frenzy of Tongs
synopsis: Set in Limehouse, London, in 1911, Frenzy Of Tongs sees inventor and gentleman adventurer, Nathan Blaze, lock horns with Hang Man Chang, would-be Emperor of the Free World, in a tale of opium, revenge and crabs.

title: Curse of the Blood of the Lizard of Doom
synopsis: It’s Edinburgh in the 1880’s and Dr. Donald Baxter is desperately searching for a cure for the common burn.

title: And Now the Fearing
synopsis: Set in London in 1972, property developer Denham, columnist Stephanie Wise and revolutionary architect Michael Mastersfind themselves trapped in a lift where their dreams become their worst nightmares.

title: Voodoo Feet of Death
synopsis: It's Thirties London when World Champion ballroom dancer Lester Crown finds his career cut cruelly short when he loses both of his feet in a freak accident with a giant pair of scissors.

title: Scream Satan Scream
synopsis: Eponymous narrator Dr. Terrible introduces the wickedly comic tale of a 1645 Blackburn witchhunt.

title: The French Doll
synopsis: Tragedy strikes when Emili is shockingly murdered by a mysterious stranger.

title: Emergency PTA Meeting
synopsis: Maki is now a teacher at a strict elementary school and trains in self-defense techniques to combat her overall sense of helplessness.

title: Brother and Sister Bear
synopsis: Akiko has withdrawn from society and lives a reclusive life at home.

title: Ten Months Ten Days
synopsis: When Yuka was a child, her mother always favored Yuka’s sickly older sister Mayu. Now the successful proprietor of a flower shop, Yuka is still consumed by jealousy.

title: Atonement
synopsis: Fifteen years since the murder of her daughter, Asako is still overtaken with grief and resentment.

title: Black Sabbath
synopsis: Mick Garris talks Mario Bava's anthology of three horror stories as told by host Boris Karloff

title: Black Sunday
synopsis: Larry Cohen talks Mario Bava's Black Sunday.

title: Carnival of Souls
synopsis: PET SEMATARY's Mary Lambert talks horror classic CARNIVAL OF SOULS.

title: City of the Living Dead
synopsis: Editor Mark Goldblatt talks Fulci's CITY OF THE LIVING DEAD.

title: Day of the Dead
synopsis: Edgar Wright (SHAUN OF THE DEAD) talks George Romero's DAY OF THE DEAD.

title: Dead and Buried
synopsis: Guillermo del Toro praises Gary Sherman's DEAD AND BURIED.

title: Deep Red
synopsis: Karyn Kusama (THE INVITATION) talks Argento's DEEP RED.

title: Eaten Alive
synopsis: Mick Garris talks Tobe Hooper's EATEN ALIVE.

title: Horror Express
synopsis: Joe Dante on the Cushing/Lee transsiberian terror, HORROR EXPRESS.

title: How to Make a Monster
synopsis: FX legend Rick Baker talks HOW TO MAKE A MONSTER.

title: Lisa and the Devil
synopsis: Joe Dante on Mario Bava's LISA AND THE DEVIL.

title: Maniac
synopsis: Darren Bousman on William Lustig's NYC stalker favorite, MANIAC.

title: Mother's Day
synopsis: Darren Bousman on Troma's MOTHER'S DAY.

title: Night of the Living Dead
synopsis: Director George Hickenlooper on Romero's immortal NIGHT OF THE LIVING DEAD.

title: Spider Baby
synopsis: Director Jack Hill discusses his own cult classic, SPIDER BABY.

title: The Hills Have Eyes
synopsis: Screenwriter Josh Olson on Wes Craven's vicious THE HILLS HAVE EYES.

title: Horror of Party Beach
synopsis: AMERICAN WEREWOLF's John Landis talks THE HORROR OF PARTY BEACH.

title: The Stuff
synopsis: Darren Bousman gets into Larry Cohen's THE STUFF.

title: Werewolves on Wheels
synopsis: Director Adam Rifkin on WEREWOLVES ON WHEELS.

title: White Zombie
synopsis: Mick Garris talks Lugosi classic, WHITE ZOMBIE.

title: Chapter 1 - The Will Reading
synopsis: Welcome to Project Cyclops. In this episode, we go back in time to a most unusual will reading.

title: Chapter 2 - The Other
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to a family being ripped apart in the most unfortunate of circumstances.

title: Chapter 3 - Subject 6-Alpha-2
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us behind the most unusual of quarantines.

title: Chapter 4 - In the Basement
synopsis: In this episode, we join two paranormal investigators on quite the unique discovery..

title: Chapter 5 - Camp Bethlehem
synopsis: In this episode, we witness a strange occurrence at a youth sobriety camp.

title: Chapter 6 - Horns Limo Service
synopsis: In this episode, something quite peculiar happens on the way to the hospital.

title: Chapter 7 - The Saber Formulation
synopsis: In this episode, we look behind the scenes of developing the Saber Formulation.

title: Chapter 8 - Tic Tac Toe
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to a home invasion gone awry.

title: Chapter 9 - The Last Interview
synopsis: In this episode, we follow Daniel during his job interview at the Center.

title: Chapter 10 - Hostile Takeover
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to Vivian Lobdow's first board meeting as the head of the center.

title: Chapter 201 - Crash Course
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to a flight on a private jet gone awry.

title: Chapter 202 - Wine and Dine
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to an event with Senator Jackson Carlisle.

title: Chapter 203 - Initiation
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to a special fraternity initiation.

title: Chapter 204 - Forgive & Forget
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to a unique experiment to develop a cure for Alzheimer's.

title: Chapter 205 - Out of the Mouths of Swine
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to a unique maze experiment taking place at the Roth Lobdow Center for Advance Research.

title: Chapter 206 - Date Night
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to a Date Night gone awry.

title: Chapter 207 - Bad Blood
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to the scene of a blood transfusion gone haywire.

title: Chapter 208 - For My Next Trick
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to an online dating encounter gone wrong.

title: Chapter 209 - Live Free and Die
synopsis: In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to a fundraiser for Senator Jackson Carlisle.

title: Chapter 210 - One Last Gambit
synopsis: In this episode, the Roth Lobdow Center faces Sigma Corp for one final showdown.

title: Talkest Night - Episode 1
synopsis: In the inaugural episode of Talkest Night Alex Aldea, Michael Varrati, Brynn Langford, Johnny Ferro and Miguel Lopez take us behind the scenes of DARKEST NIGHT. They discuss their favorite memories, Michelle Visage, making sound effects, casting, and share bloopers.

title: Talkest Night - Finale
synopsis: In the second episode of Talkest Night: Alex Aldea, Victor Figueroa and Callie Schuttera take us behind the scenes of Darkest Night. They discuss how they started working together, the finale, and next projects.

title: Beyond The Walls Ep. 1
synopsis: On the first night in her new house, Lisa enters a terrifying parallel dimension with no way out.

title: Beyond The Walls Ep. 2
synopsis: Julian and Lisa’s bond grows while he teaches her how to avoid the evil forces in the house.

title: Beyond The Walls Ep. 3
synopsis: After being separated from Julian, Lisa is reunited with her sister and a mysterious old woman.

title: Trick or Treat
synopsis: Some unusual late-night visitors darken a miser's doorway after he dares his neighbors to send their children into his haunted house.

title: The New Man
synopsis: A recovering alcoholic is slowly driven back to the bottle–and emotional ruin–after a boy named Jerry shows up in his life and insists that he's his son.

title: I'll Give You A Million
synopsis: A man accepts a million dollars for his immortal soul, but soon finds out that he's dying of cancer.

title: Painkiller
synopsis: A doctor prescribes a miraculous cure for a patient with back pains.

title: The Odds
synopsis: Lacey is a gambler who just can't lose. But when he wagers that a rival will die at a specific hour, Lacey learns an untimely secret.

title: Mookie and Pookie
synopsis: Mookie and Pookie are very close fraternal twins.

title: Slippage
synopsis: After a lifetime of "slipping through the cracks" of life, a young graphic designer begins to literally "slip" from reality.

title: The Word Procesor of the Gods
synopsis: Richard Hagstrom is disgusted with how his life has turned out until his nephew, Jonathan, gives him a homemade word processor. Quickly learning he can rewrite his life, Richard finds fantasy is sometimes a harsh reality.

title: A Case of the Stubborns
synopsis: A backwoods family learns that some people don't know when it's time to leave.

title: Djinn, No Chaser
synopsis: An unfriendly genie stuck in a magic lamp refuses to grant wishes and instead terrorizes a couple.

title: All A Clone By The Telephone
synopsis: A magical answering machine helps a luckless TV writer discover new material.

title: In the Cards
synopsis: A cursed deck of cards proves to be a deadly gamble for a fake fortune-teller doing predictions.

title: Anniversary Dinner
synopsis: On the run from her boyfriend, a young girl is taken in by a friendly couple who invite her to their special anniversary dinner.

title: Snip Snip
synopsis: It's a bewtiching battle of wills after a warlock and a witch each lay claim to a $10 million lottery ticket.

title: Answer Me
synopsis: A constantly ringing neighbor's phone torments Joan, an English actress subletting an apartment in Manhattan.

title: The Tear Collector
synopsis: Unable to stop stobbing, Prudence find a way to profit from her sadness when she meets a man who collects tears.

title: The Madness Room
synopsis: With a plan to scare her husband to death, Cathy Osborne and her friend, Michael, bring him to the "madness room": a room from which they claim no one has ever stayed the night and survived. Little do they know they are in store for some unadulterated terror.

title: If the Shoes Fit...
synopsis: While staying at a hotel for a meeting, Bo Gumbs, a fast-talking politician running for governor, learns his true colors.

title: Levitation
synopsis: Kharma was once one of the greatest magicians in the world. Now, doing a cheap act in a flea-bitten circus, the once-great illusionist is heckled by a fan who quickly learns the ups and downs of real magic.

title: It All Comes Out in the Wash
synopsis: A greedy developer discovers a Chinese laundry that offers to "wash out" guilt.

title: Bigalow's Last Smoke
synopsis: Mr. Bigalow is driven to the brink of madness by a mysterious fugure on TV.

title: The False Prophet
synopsis: Cassie Pines discovers Horace X, a mechanical fortune-teller, in a diner.

title: The Impressionist
synopsis: The government wants to communicate with an alien, so they bring in impressionist, "Mr. Personalities." After making "contact," the alien departs leaving Mr. Personalities depressed. But a surprise visit turns the impressionist's frown upside-down.

title: Lifebomb
synopsis: Lifebomb, a special medical firm, implants a device in rich businessman Ben Martin that will let him live forever. But now all Ben wants to do is die.

title: Ring Around the Redhead
synopsis: While sitting in an electric chair, waiting to be executed, Billy relates the strange tale of how he came to be in his shocking preicament, all thanks to an attractive woman.

title: Parlour Floor Front
synopsis: Fearful of a voodoo-practicing tenant, a woman plots to evict him from their home. But after the truth is revealed, he exacts a terrifying revenge.

title: Halloween Candy
synopsis: A mean old man learns a hard lesson about tricks and treats when he doesn't play nice on Halloween.

title: The Satanic Piano
synopsis: After losing his inpsiration to play, pianist Pete Bancroft is given a piano that lets himself play as never before. But there's a price to pay for newfound talent.

title: The Devil's Advocate
synopsis: Mandrake, a hate-spewing radio host, gets several calls telling him that he's dead. Unable to leave the broadcast booth, he finds himself transformed into a demon who must broadcast for eternity.

title: Distant Signals
synopsis: A mysterious inventor wants a famous director to complete an old TV series, which was canceled before the series' final episodes were shown for his "foreign viewers."

title: The Trouble with Mary Jane
synopsis: Offered $50,000 to rid a possessed girl with multiple demons, two occultists quickly find themselves having a devil of a time.

title: Ursa Minor
synopsis: Joan's daughter's new Teddy bear seems cute and cuddly...until sounds of something large and moving through the house are heard at night and huge claw marks are found on the walls.

title: Effect and Cause
synopsis: Everything is turned upside down for Kate when she discovers she has the ability to live backwards.

title: Monsters in My Room
synopsis: Little Timmy keeps trying to get his mother and mean stepfather to believe that there are monsters living under his bed...before it's too late.

title: Comet Watch
synopsis: Innocently watching Halley's Comet, astronomer Englebert Ames gets the shock of a lifetime when Sir Edmond Halley himself arrives...trying to elude an obsessed woman.

title: Dream Girl
synopsis: All the world's a stage when a group of people find themselves trapped as a theater group in a stagehand's dream.

title: A New Lease on Life
synopsis: Overjoyed to find an inexpensive apartment with modern amenities, the new tenant soon learns there's something living beneath the surface of his home, sweet home.

title: Printer's Devil
synopsis: To ensure success, a literary agent convinces a writer to put some blood into his work...along with some other warm-blooded ingredients.

title: The Shrine
synopsis: Returning home, a young woman, Christine, finds herself in competition for her mother's attention with Chrissie, an idealized younger version of herself.

title: The Last Car
synopsis: Stacey finds she's on the ride of her life when she boards a train full of odd and bizarre-mannered passengers.

title: A Choice of Dreams
synopsis: Suffering from a terminal illness, a mob boss learns that dying can be hell after he accepts a man's offer to give him his choice of dreams after death.

title: Strange Love
synopsis: After making a late-night house call, Dr. Carrol discovers that his injured patient and her husband don't want the kindly doctor to leave...ever.

title: The Unhappy Medium
synopsis: At the reading of a deceased preacher's will, his family discovers he left them nothing. But, on a videotape, he warns them that he will send them a sign.

title: Fear of Floating
synopsis: A down-on-his-luck man finds his life is up in the air. Reluctant to admit that the truth will set him free, he finds the more he lies, the more he floats.

title: The Casavin Curse
synopsis: After their great grandfather murders his wife, the rest of the family find themselves saddled with a killer curse until the family name is dead...and so are they.

title: I Can't Help Saying Goodbye
synopsis: In a very frightening twist of fate, whenever a young girl says "goodbye" to someone, the person later dies.

title: The Bitterest Pill
synopsis: A mistreated boys turns the tables on his abusive parents after his eccentric uncle shows up with his latest invention: a pill that increases memory and brain power.

title: Florence Bravo
synopsis: History repeats itself after a young couple moves into a house occupied by the ghost of a murdered feminist.

title: The Geezenstacks
synopsis: A little girl finds she has newfound powers over her family after she comes to own a once-abandoned dollhouse

title: Black Widows
synopsis: A dark, mysterious family secret is revealed to a young woman on her wedding night.

title: Heretic
synopsis: A wealthy art collector finds he gets more than he bargained for when he buys a stolen painting from a thief.

title: A Serpent's Tooth
synopsis: "Mother knows best" has never been more true than when a mom's warnings become reality.

title: Baker's Dozen
synopsis: A crooked advertising agent gets his comeuppance after a voodoo witch gives him a taste of real magic.

title: Deliver Us From Goodness
synopsis: A young woman finds that it's hell being a saint...no matter how hard she tries to fall from grace.

title: Seasons of Belief
synopsis: Twas the night before Christmas...and a couple of mean parents are about to learn the truth about giving and receiving.

title: Miss May Dusa
synopsis: After leaving several people dead in her wake, a strange woman discovers the secret to her killer powers.

title: The Milkman Cometh
synopsis: One man learns the hard way that you should be very careful what you wish for after a mysterious neighborhood milkman fulfills his final wish.

title: My Ghostwriter - The Vampire
synopsis: A frustrated horror writer strikes a deal with a coffin-dwelling vampire, only to pay a very big price for his success.

title: My Own Place
synopsis: Wanting to get an apartment for herself, a desperate woman is forced to take in a male roommate. After his untimely death, the woman discovers he left her a frightening inheritance.

title: Red Leader
synopsis: In return for wealth and power, an unscrupulous businessman stikes a deal with Lucifer.

title: Everybody Needs a Little Love
synopsis: While a lonely, divorced man is no dummy, the object of his affection is. Or is she?

title: The Social Climber
synopsis: Waking in others' shoes proves to be a powerful experience for a young shoemaker's assistant.

title: The Swap
synopsis: A wife's plot to murder her rich husband backfires horribly.

title: Let the Games Begin
synopsis: Harry is dead. But he's got one last important decision to make: Who gets his soul? An angel or the devil?

title: The Enormous Radio
synopsis: A couple gets great radio reception...of their neighbors' private conversations. But the wife becomes terrified that her neighbors can hear her, too.

title: Beetles
synopsis: Ignoring a warning, an archaeologist gets more than he hoped for after opening a sarcophagus.

title: Mary, Mary
synopsis: Unable to relate to people, a woman resorts to living with mannequins until she experiences a harsh realty.

title: The Spirit Photographer
synopsis: An inventor/photographer is determined to capture spirits on film despite discouragement from his friend.

title: The Moth
synopsis: Obsessed with the idea that her soul will reside in a moth until she can be restored to life, a woman convinces her mother to capture the insect.

title: No Strings
synopsis: A mobster forces a puppeteer to string up his defeated rival and make him dance. But the puppeteer and rival end up pulling the mobster's strings.

title: The Grave Robber
synopsis: Two treasure hunters discover a mummy who challenges one of the explorers to a revealing game of strip poker.

title: The Yattering and Jack
synopsis: A demon does everything it can to haunt Jack, who remains oblivious to its actions. Frustrated, the demon resorts to getting physical with Jack… with dire results. Based on a story by Clive Barker.

title: Seymourlama
synopsis: Seymour is a boy whose behaviour leaves much to be desired. Much to his parents' amazement, he's been named High Lama by a group of monks.

title: Sorry, Right Number
synopsis: A woman receives a mysterious and disturbing phone call forewarning her of someone's death. At the funeral, she is shocked and dismayed at who the mystery caller is. Written by Stephen King.

title: Payment Overdue
synopsis: A heartless collection agent learns the hard way that what goes around, comes around.

title: The Deal
synopsis: A screenwriter finds his soul is in turnaround after he unwittingly makes a deal with the devil. His only chance to break free is to deliver another victim.

title: The Apprentice
synopsis: Thinking that working at a Puritan Museum will be pure joy, a woman mysteriously goes back in time.

title: The Cutty Black Sow
synopsis: A dying grandmother tells her 12 year-old grandson how to avoid the curse of The Cutty Black Sow. The boy vows to protect his grandmother, but learns too late that all curses are relative.

title: The Family Reunion
synopsis: Written by Edithe Swensen. A social worker looks into the case of a father who kidnapped his son only to discover there's far more to the story than meets the eye.

title: Going Native
synopsis: Resembling a normal Earth female, an alien infiltrates American society in order to study human behaviour, only to be trapped by her findings.

title: Hush
synopsis: Based on a story by Zenna Henderson. To pass the time, Buddy and his babysitter play with one of his inventions; a machine that eats sounds. But their lives are in danger when things go out of control, sucking the life out of everything in the house.

title: Barter
synopsis: At her wit's end due to her son's constant drumming, a mother strikes a bargain with an alien who needs ammonia.

title: Basher Malone
synopsis: Looking to take on a truly great opponent, the Basher gets fooled intoa hellish fight with a demon.
